mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(a.SMS_ID) FROM COMTN_SMS a WHERE 1=1
AND a.SMS_ID in (SELECT SMS_ID FROM COMTN_SMS_RECPTN WHERE RECPTN_TELNO LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND a.TRNSMIS_CN LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT a.SMS_ID AS "smsId" , a.TRNSMIS_TELNO AS "trnsmitTelno" , a.TRNSMIS_CN AS "trnsmitCn" , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS "frstRegisterId" , b.USER_NM AS "frstRegisterNm" , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" FROM COMTN_SMS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.SMS_ID = #{smsId}
SELECT a.SMS_ID AS "smsId" , a.RECPTN_TELNO AS "recptnTelno" , a.RESULT_CODE AS "resultCode" , a.RESULT_MSSAGE AS "resultMssage" FROM COMTN_SMS_RECPTN a WHERE a.SMS_ID = #{smsId}
